artist_name: Bryan Scary and the Shredding Tears
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, The Red Umbrella is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: The Red Umbrella has sections analyzed in the following keys: B Mixolydian, B Major, G♯ Minor, E♭ Mixolydian,  and B♭ Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
